meat.p:
Hi, I'm April, aka 王奕. I am a PhD student at the University of Michigan, School of Information, advised by Dr. Steve Oney and Dr. Christopher Brooks. My research interests focus on end-user programming and educational technologies. My recent project is about exploring how data scientists collaborate in computational notebooks.

Previously, I spent two years as a thesis-based Master student in the Human-Computer Interaction Lab at the School of Computing Science, Simon Fraser University. I finished my Bachelor's degree in College of Computer Science and Technology, Zhejiang Univerisity, China.

p.news: Excited to start the new semester as a PhD student in Umich!
Our paper, "Mismatch of Expectations: How Modern Learning Resources Fail Conversational Programmers", received the honorable mention award on CHI 2018!
I am currently applying to Ph.D. programs in Human-Computer Interaction!
Presented our poster on conversational programmer at ICER'17, Tacoma WA
Our paper on Social Cheatsheet was accepted to CSCW2018!
Attended CRA Women Grad Cohort Workshop 2017, Washington DC
Served as the teaching assistant for CMPT363 User Interface Design

item.content: April Y. Wang, Ryan Mitts, Philip J. Guo and Parmit K. Chilana. 2018. Mismatch of Expectations: How Modern Learning Resources Fail Conversational Programmers. Proceedings of the ACM Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems (CHI18).

Laton Vermette, Shruti Dembla, April Y. Wang, Joanna McGrenere and Parmit K. Chilana. 2018. Social CheatSheet: An Interactive Community-Curated Information Overlay for Web Applications. Proceedings of the ACM : Human-Computer Interaction (1,1), Computer-Supported Cooperative Work and Social Computing (CSCW18).

April Y. Wang and Parmit K. Chilana. 2017. Investigating Learning Strategies of Conversational Programmers. ACM Conference on International Computing Education Research (ICER17), Tacoma, WA, August 2017.

project.name: Investigating Learning Strategies of Conversational Programmers
project.abstract: Conducting interviews with 23 conversational programmers to investigate their learning strategies

project.abstract: Designing the user interface of a block-based programming solution for developing IoT applications.

project.abstract: Implementing real-time SSS rendering techniques on human skin.
